> Indication of updates needed (Test with caution / Question before failing)
> Consideration for omission (Due to change in functional specifications)

title: Verify: Logged in Xbox Live account is required to access app content
custom_preconds:
-No Xbox Live user account is signed in
-MLB.tv app is installed on the device
custom_steps:
1. Select the MLB.TV app tile (in Apps section on Xbox dashboard)

-App launches-
custom_expected:
The user will receive an access gate (Xbox Live Sign In prompt screen displays)
AND we will be unable to continue without first logging in to Xbox Live.

SELECT "Sign In" button opens the external MS Xbox Live Sign in app/menu.

title: Verify: Logging in to Xbox Live account at Sign In prompt, then allows access to app content
custom_preconds:
-No Xbox Live user account is signed in
-MLB.tv app is installed on the test kit device
-Internet connection and MS Xbox Live is up and running
*Sandbox specific Xbox Live account required
custom_steps:
1. Select the MLB.TV app tile (.xex file uploaded to device)
-App launch & Xbox Live Sign in prompt displays-
2. Select Sign in
-the external MS Xbox Live Sign in app/menu opens-
3. Sign in with (*valid) Xbox Live user account
custom_expected: App proceeds to Home screen.

title: Verify: Selecting MLB.tv successfully opens MLB.tv when signed in to an Xbox Live account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox 360 system
AND has installed the "MLB.tv" app
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "MLB.tv" app from the menu
custom_expected: THEN the "MLB.tv" app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.tv app can be accessed while the Xbox 360 is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox 360
AND the system is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the MLB.tv app is installed

Note: SF CD QA does not have a Wireless network adapter to test this with.
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the MLB.tv app from the menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.tv app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.tv app can be accessed while the Xbox 360 is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox 360 system
AND the system is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND the MLB.tv app is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the MLB.tv app from the app menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.tv app will open successfully

title: Login: Verify Start-up message opens; if mlb.com user account is not logged in and attempts to access game content
custom_preconds:
-MLB.tv app is installed on the device
-Internet connection and MS Xbox Live is up and running
-Xbox Live user account is signed in
-mlb.com user account is NOT signed in
(or user is signed in with un-entitled account for the selected game feed; e.g. single team subscriptions attempt other teams video feed)
custom_steps:
1. Launch the app
2. Select any Live or archived game tile
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with a Start-up screen (promoting Premium subscription) with two buttons:
+ a "I have a subscription" (sign in) button 
+ a "Return to MLB.TV" (back) button will display beside it

title: Login: Verify Login message opens; when Selecting "I have a subscription" LOG IN button (from Start-up message)
custom_preconds:
- MLB.tv app is installed on the device
- Internet connection and MS Xbox Live is up and running
- Xbox Live user account is signed in
- mlb.com user account is NOT signed in
custom_steps:
When we Navigate to any live or archived game 
AND select any available feed
AND are presented with a Start-up screen
AND we select "I have a Subscription" (SIGN IN button)
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with a SIGN IN screen
AND an Email Address field will be present
AND a Password field will be present
AND a SIGN IN button will display underneath

title: Login: Verify user is able to access Sign in screen from Settings > Account Management
custom_preconds:
-MLB.tv app is installed on the device
-Internet connection and MS Xbox Live is up and running
-Xbox Live user account is signed in
-mlb.com user account is NOT signed in
custom_steps:
WHEN we Navigate to the Settings tab (on Home screen) 
AND select My Subscription button
AND we are presented with an "Account Management" screen
custom_expected:
THEN a "I have a Subscription" SIGN IN button will display
AND when we select the Sign in button

THEN we will be presented with a SIGN IN screen 
AND an Email Address field will be present
AND a password field will be present
AND a SIGN IN button will display underneath

title: Login: Pressing the Back button from the Login Screen returns the user to the previous screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.tv app
AND we are on the Login Screen

Note: Login screen displays when attempting to access game content without an entitled user signed in, or when Login button is selected from Settings menu.
custom_steps: WHEN we press the Back (B) button
custom_expected:
THEN we will be returned to the previous screen.

option 1: Settings
option 2: Game day

title: Login: Verify Login failed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the MLB.tv app
AND we go to Settings and select My Subscription
And we select "I have a Subscription" button
AND we enter invalid MLB.com credentials
custom_expected:
THEN a Login Error Message will appear under the Password field
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated
AND all formatting and text will be readable

"The account name or password was incorrect. Please verify login credentials and try again."

title: Login: Verify after incorrectly entering credentials the user is able to enter credentials again
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have entered Invalid credentials at the Login Screen
custom_steps: WHEN we see the login error text
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to navigate back to the Email and password fields
AND we will be able to attempt to enter credentials again

title: Login: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.tv app
AND we are on the Login Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the Text
AND we look at the buttons
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the text is spelled correctly on the page
AND each label is formatted correctly

title: Home: Verify when MLB.tv is accessed the user lands on the Home screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed mlb.tv
AND we have previously logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN MLB.tv is accessed with 
a. Premium entitled account
b. All other types of accounts
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen with

a. 1st  tab in focus.

IF Show Scores: ON
THEN there will be 5 tabs on the page
TODAY
YESTERDAY
SCHEDULE
HIGHLIGHTS
SETTINGS


IF Show Scores: OFF
THEN there will be 4 tabs on the page
TODAY
YESTERDAY
SCHEDULE
SETTINGS


b. IF Show Scores: ON
THEN there will be 5 tabs on the page
RECAPS
YESTERDAY
SCHEDULE
HIGHLIGHTS
SETTINGS

IF Show Scores: OFF
THEN there will be 4 tabs on the page
RECAPS
YESTERDAY
SCHEDULE
SETTINGS

AND we access MLb.tv app
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the Home Screen options
custom_expected:

title: Home: Verify data updates within 30 seconds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLb.tv
AND we have accessed MLb.tv app
AND Show Scores: ON
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the Home Screen
AND the Live Broadcast changes
custom_expected:
THEN the Game tiles will refresh within 30 seconds
AND the status display will update accordingly

> NOTE: game tiles are enabled if media is tagged with Media_On

title: Home: Verify user is able to navigate to next content block sides
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLb.tv
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are on the Home Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to navigate to the *available tabs (e.g. Today, Yesterday, Schedule, Highlights, Recaps, Settings)

*tabs are dynamic depending on Show Scores setting
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to do so without issue

title: Verify Today and Yesterday's games are correct per scheduled
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to Today and Yesterday on Home
2. Confirm games scheduled using web
3. Check screen before 7am PT (10am ET)
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the games displayed in app on their respective days are correct

NOTE:  The schedule change is a MANUAL process and therefore may not change exactly at 7am PT (10am ET).  As long as the schedule flip occurs between 7am and 8am PT, this case can be passed.  Since this is a manual process, failure of this case should not warrant a failure of the build (but should be reported).

title: Navigation: Verify currently active section's header displays current location clearly
custom_preconds:
[C48928]
GIVEN we have installed the MLb.tv app
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the different Home sections
custom_expected:
THEN the section headers will update accordingly
AND the currently active section shows accordingly
 - *Today (premium subscriptions signed in)
 - Tomorrow 
 - Schedule
 - Highlights
 - Settings

- RECAPS displays first if not signed in or not premium subscriber

title: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds: Home Team has NOT been selected
custom_steps: 1. Navigate to Home pivot and reviewing each of the tab views
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the text is spelled correctly for each section
AND each label is formatted correctly

- "Today & "Yesterday" (and the correct corresponding games for each date)
- Team logos
- Game status, stats, pitchers if applicable
- Buttons: SCHEDULE, HIGHLIGHTS, SETTINGS

note: Currently all game times are displayed in Eastern Time zone.  (Possible for future feature request to be consistent with XB1; that game times should reflect US timezones as are detected from system settings; otherwise "All times Eastern" displays.)

custom_steps:
1.At Calendar note the current month displayed
2. Navigate and select the on screen buttons:

 - Left Trigger
 - Right Trigger


Navigate back and forward though the months to the beginning/end of what is available.
custom_expected:
Screen updates to correctly display all text, buttons and design elements of the previous month when Left Trigger is pulled.

Screen updates to correctly display all text, buttons and design elements of the next month when Right Trigger is pulled.

title: Help
custom_steps:
When the user activates the Help option
And observes the screen
And verifies the link provided in the Help section
custom_expected:
Then the text shows:
>"To learn more, please to go to http://mlb.com/xboxfaq on another device for assistance"

And upon verifying the link, the user is redirected and brought to: http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/subscriptions/index.jsp?content=products&c_id=mlb

NOTE:  If any changes in text or redirect has occurred, reverify with the TPM and make the appropriate changes to this test case.

title: Exit MLB.tv
custom_expected:
Exit tile displays.

When "Exit MLB.tv" tile is selected, Exit confirmation message displays offering user option to return to app, or exit.

YES returns to Xbox Dash
No returns to MLB.tv app

title: ***Logout: Verify choosing Logout options successfully logs the user out of their account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an MLB.com account
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to the Settings section
AND we select Log Out
AND we confirm we wish to logout by re-selecting log out on the Log out confirmation screen
custom_expected:
THEN we will be successfully logged out of our mlb.com account
AND we will be returned to the Settings page
AND Logout button will update to say "Log In"
AND the logged out user's profile settings and entitlements will be cleared (and not be stored locally).

title: ***Logout:  Verify once logged out, previously accessible paid content can no longer be accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an MLB.com account
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to Settings
and we select Unlink
custom_expected:
THEN we will be logged out of the MLB.tv account
AND we will be unable to further access any paid mlb.com content that we could previously access

title: ***Logout: Verify user's credentials are not maintained after logging out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an MLB.com account
custom_steps:
WHEN we go to Settings
AND we complete the Log Out process
AND we navigate back to the login screen from Settings
custom_expected:
THEN our previously logged in credentials will not be populated in the Email/Password fields
AND we need to fill in our credentials again

title: ***Verify if the user's profile access rights update that these are reflected in the app's viewable content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an MLB.com account
custom_steps:
WHEN the accounts' access rights/profile are updated on the mlb.com website

example: favorite teams are changed, removed, added, or Password is changed, etc.

note: Some connected devices read/write user's show/hide scores settings from/to web; xb360 does not (xbox 360 uses local Hide/show scores settings)
custom_expected:
THEN the changes will be reflected in the application
AND the newly restricted content will be hidden/removed
OR the newly unrestricted content will now be available

title: ***Verify: Confirm that logging out as one user and logging in as another access rights behave accordingly (unrestricted to restricted)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an MLB.com account
AND the account has premium entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to Settings
AND we select Log Out
AND we login with an account that DOES NOT HAVE premium entitlements
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be unable to view the previously unrestricted content
AND the content will be restricted accordingly

title: ***Verify: Confirm that logging out as one user and logging in as another access rights behave accordingly (restricted to unrestricted)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the MLB.tv app
AND we have successfully logged in with an MLB.com account
AND the account is not Premium entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to Settings
AND we select Log Out
AND we login with an account that has Premium entitlement
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be able to view the previously restricted content
AND the content will have no access right issues

title: Verify: User receives an access gate if they have not logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their system
AND the  device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "MLB.tv" app is installed
AND the user has not previously accessed the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN the "MLB.tv" app is accessed
AND a game is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an access gate
AND we will be unable to continue without first logging in

title: Verify: User will NOT receive an access gate if they have previously logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox One
AND the device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "MLB.tv" app is installed
AND we have already logged into the MLB.tv with an account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the MLB.tv from Xbox Home screen
custom_expected:
THEN the access gate will not be encountered
AND the user will be brought mlb.tv Home screen

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the XB1 connected to a wired network connection
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a LIVE video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a LIVE video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the XB1 connected to a wired network connection

AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a Video On Demand (archive) video feed
AND we attempt to play this

AND the feed will play without issue

title: Play: Verify video playback launches in full screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the XB1 connected to a wired network connection
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a LIVE video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will launch
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Play: Verify In-Player Navigation UI appear for 5 seconds after any button is pressed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap:
*Joystick
* d-pad
*(A) button
* LB/RB


note: * LT/RT UI will come on screen and stay on as scanning fwd/back is in progress; until user selects point in stream of cancels using (b) button
custom_expected:
THEN the In-Player Navigation UI overlay the video playback
AND after 5 seconds they disappear
AND tapping any button again will repeat the appearing function

title: ***Play: Verify that linear playback can continue for up to at least 2 hours without issue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is a LIVE game
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the event
AND we receive the Playback Option prompt
AND we select "Live"
AND we stay in the Linear stream for at least 2 hours
custom_expected:
THEN playback will continue as expected
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream

title: ***Play archived game: User chooses "Beginning" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN we activate a game stream
AND allow it to play and/or FFWD to any time within the stream
AND we back out of the video
AND we receive the feed select prompt
AND we select "Beginning"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start
AND the location will be at the beginning

title: ***Play LIVE game: User chooses "Beginning" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is a LIVE game
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the video
AND we receive the feed select prompt
AND we select "Beginning"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start
AND the location will be at the beginning
AND when the feed reaches the end the user will be returned to their original access point

Note: When started from beginning, the user may scan forward or select LIVE UI option to advance to the live point in the stream.

title: ***Play: User chooses "Live" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is a LIVE game
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the video
AND we receive the feed select prompt
AND we select "Live"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start
AND the location will be at the current LIVE location
AND when the feed reaches the end the user will continue into the next scheduled show

**User will have been placed into the Linear feed by choosing Live**

title: ***Play: User chooses "Resume" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is a bookmarked game (a game that has been previously viewed and exited before reaching completion)
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the video
AND we receive the feed select prompt
AND we select "Resume"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start
AND the location will be at the last location viewed when previously played

title: XR-03: Verify app acknowledges change in User entitlement when switching XBlive accounts during playback
custom_steps:
1. Sign into an Xbox profile linked to a publisher account.
2. Ensure that the console is set as the userâ€™s Home console and launch the title.
3. From the main menu, select any full game and proceed into media playback by selecting a HOME or AWAY feed.
4. Press the Xbox button to constrain the title.
5. Access the Xbox Home account picker and sign out of the Xbox profile mentioned in step [1].
6. Sign back into the Xbox profile mentioned in step [1] and resume the title.
7. From the Sign In screen, select Sign In > the Xbox profile in use.
custom_expected:
The title must allow the user to resume use of the title following a sign-in change.



Failing ex: Observe that the title remains on the Sign In screen.

title: ***Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are currently connected using a wireless ad hoc network
AND we begin playing a video
custom_steps:
WHEN we throttle the network connectivity using Fiddler:

> EX:
> 8mbps (delay value 4)
> 4mbps (delay value 6)
> 2mbps (delay value 8)

Both down and up
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the bitrate adapt
AND the video playback will adjust accordingly based on the connectivity of the wireless ad hoc network

title: ***Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are connected to an Ad Hoc network
AND the connectivity has been throttled to a lower byte setting
custom_steps:
WHEN we begin playback
AND we slowly increase the available connectivity speeds
custom_expected: THEN the video quality will improve to a higher bitrate as the connectivity improves

title: ***Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are currently connected using a wireless ad hoc network
AND we begin playing a video
custom_steps:
WHEN we throttle the network connectivity using Terminal Commands for our Ad Hoc Network to lower the connectivity speeds
AND we throttle the network connectivity to increase the connectivity speeds
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the quality of the video adjusts in both directions in correlation with the connectivity speed

Note:  XB1 has a cache of about 30 seconds of video, so if internet connection is downgraded, lost, restored, there is a 30 second delay between the update in status and the video playback reflecting the change.

title: Trickplay: Verify only Pause/Play and Scan Back during pre-roll ad is allowed
custom_preconds: Recap/Highlight player and Archived content will make a call for ads if response returns a valid response, the pre-roll ad is inserted automatically...and if the VAST manifest includes midrolls they would be inserted also.
custom_expected:
The user cannot FF through an ad, but can pause and back-navigate.

If the user rewinds past or to an ad that has already played once, the ad is skipped.  (If the user then leaves the player page and returns, the ad will be shown again)

title: Verify pre-roll only plays once per video launch; once the ad completes, user cannot scan back to it
Verify transition from ad to video playback is smooth.
custom_expected:
Make sure the transition is not too long (a few seconds) and shows a spinner.


note: newer devices have a much speedier/smooth transition between the pre-roll ad and game (recaps, highlight, etc.)

title: Verify Player Controls function as expected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap A controller button
AND the In-player UI overlay appears
AND we attempt these displayed controls
custom_expected:
THEN the controls will function as displayed:
> A :Select
> d-pad controllerleft/right; nav l/r through UI
> controller LB/RB buttons; nav left right through prev/next milestone in timeline
> B : Exit Playback

title: LIVE: Verify that Live button is available for live streams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is a LIVE game
AND we play the Live Linear video stream from the Beginning or any point before the present LIVE point in the stream,
custom_steps: WHEN we open In-Player navigation UI and observe the CONTROL options
custom_expected:
THEN the LIVE option will be enabled
AND when we select LIVE
THEN the video stream will update to the live point accordingly.

title: CC: Verify that Closed Captioning is available for live streams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is a LIVE game
custom_steps:
WHEN we play the Live Linear video stream
AND we attempt to toggle on Closed Captioning
custom_expected: Then the Closed Captioning will turn on accordingly

title: CC: Verify that Closed Captioning is available for Video on Demand streams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND there is an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN we access any VOD archive content
AND we begin playback
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to successfully enable Closed Captioning
AND we will be able to successfully disable Closed Captioning

title: CC: Verify that setting is retained
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed mlb.tv
AND we have launched a stream
AND we have enabled Closed Captioning
custom_steps:
WHEN we exit the application
AND we launch a new stream
custom_expected: THEN the Closed Captioning setting will still be ON when we access the application again

title: CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "On"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we access a video stream
AND playback begins
custom_expected: THEN we can turn Closed Captioning ON

title: CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "Off"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we begin video playback
AND we turn on Closed Captioning
AND we attempt to turn OFF Closed Captioning
custom_expected: THEN Closed Captioning will stop appearing for the video feed

title: CC: Verify user Closed Caption status is properly reflected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we have begun video playback
custom_steps:
WHEN we turn Closed Captioning ON
OR we turn Closed Captioning OFF
custom_expected:
THEN the current CC status will be properly reflected in the on screen controls

note: 
CC On - button is green when highlighted
Off  - button is white when highlighted

title: Markers: Verify user selects a milestone marker that the user is properly brought to the appropriate location
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we are watching video with inning markers (archived or Live game)
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate on the timeline to an inning marker (using controller RB or LB buttons)
custom_expected:
THEN The playhead will move to the next/previous marker
AND playback will begin at the appropriate marker

title: Video: Verify incremental Rewind speed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a video stream
AND we attempt to Rewind
AND we press the REW control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the REW speed should increment accordingly

title: Video: Verify incremental Fast Forward speed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a video stream
AND we attempt to Fast Forward
AND we press the FF control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the FF speed should increment accordingly

title: AUDIO: Verify Change Audio menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we play a live or archived game (with more than 1 audio feed available)
custom_steps:
WHEN we open In-Player navigation UI and select the CONTROL options
And select the CHANGE AUDIO option
custom_expected:
THEN the CHANGE AUDIO feed menu will open over the video playback
AND when we toggle between the radio feed they will be in focus
AND when we select an audio feed
THEN the audio stream will update to the selected feed accordingly.

note: The lowest bitrate video feeds do not have alternate audio feeds, so only the if alternate feed is selected and bitrate drops, the audio switches to native audio of home video feed.

title: LINESCORE: Verify Linescore updates as game progresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
AND we launch a Live video feed
AND we tap A controller button to open In-Player Navigation UI
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to Linescore option
custom_expected:
THEN the current game's linescore will display.

IF Scores OFF:
THEN Linescore displays 9 innings with dashes "-" in place of linescore data.

IF scores ON:
THEN Linescores displays 9+ innings with linescore data updating in *realtime 


*MF data score data updates at end of inning.

title: Launch Audio Feed - Confirm Appearance
custom_preconds: Feed Select for a live game is open and at least one Audio Feed is available.
custom_steps: Activate any Audio Feed.
custom_expected:
Confirm:

+ Teams and radio broadcast info
+ Stadium Text (home team)
+ feed launches as expected; expected audio plays

In Player UI displays:
 ++ Linescore (if scores are ON), other wise data is replaced by "-"

Note: Stadium Backgrounds do not appear in XB360

title: Feed Playback
custom_preconds: Audio feed has been successfully launched and is playing back expected audio.
custom_steps: Confirm audio plays through from near beginning to completion.
custom_expected: Audio plays back as expected and jumps out to view launched from upon completion.

title: Pause/Play and Exit
custom_preconds: Audio feed has been successfully launched and is playing back expected audio.
custom_steps:
1. During playback, select the (pause) button in the player UI
2. Then select the (play) to resume.
3. Tap controller [B] to exit.
custom_expected: Confirm playback stops at pause (does not pause and hold position in stream - this is OK and as expected), resumes from live position at resume and exits Audio Player to page launched from at activation.

title: Verify Player Controls function as expected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed MLB.TV 
AND we have accessed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND the In-player UI overlay *appears
AND we attempt these displayed controls

* Audio Player differs from Video player in that progress bar/timeline and Milestone data is not displayed.

Two buttons display:
Pause - (this acts as Mute; stream always plays live audio)
Stop - Exits audio player
custom_expected:
THEN the controls will function as displayed:
> A :Select
> d-pad controllerleft/right; nav l/r through UI
> B : Exit Playback

title: Gesture: Verify that the User can hover any tile on-screen and it will press said title, bringing the user to the next screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the <app> is installed
AND we have already logged into and Xbox Live/MLB linked user account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
custom_steps:
When we hover over a page header located at landing screen:
(RECAPS) is non-premium user signed in
TODAY
YESTERDAY
SCHEDULE
SETTINGS
HIGHLIGHTS (if scores are not OFF)
AND we wait for the circle around the hand to fill
custom_expected: Then the tile is pressed and it will bring the user to the next screen

title: Gesture: While watching a broadcast, the user is able to use the media controls to navigate the video on-screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "MLB TV" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into MLB.TV with an account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
AND we are watching a video in progress
custom_steps:
When the user hovers over top of the screen where the media controls are

Test Points:
- Dragging the Playback start position
- Pause
- Exit
custom_expected: The user is able to use the controls without hassle from the app

title: ***Gesture: During the upsell, the user is able to navigate into and out of the upsell page, as well as, select any button on the screen
Voice: User says "Xbox" while on the Home screen and is then greeted with visual voice commands that are displayed clearly to said user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the <app> installed
AND we have already launched the app
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
custom_steps: When we say "Xbox" on the Home Screen
custom_expected: Then we are presented with overlays over each tiles with the right audio command to access said tile

title: Voice: User is able to access media player controls after saying "Xbox" during a video in progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "MLB.TV" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into the MLB.TV with an account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
AND we are watching a video in progress
custom_steps:
When the user says "Xbox" during a video in progress
AND uses any of the voices commands shown for the media player

Test Points:
- Pause
- Play
- Rewind
- Forward
- Stop
custom_expected: Then the voice commands react to each correct command corresponding to the right action in the media player

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Free MLB.com User account has been created
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Free MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Free MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: Free User / Non- Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD Live/VOD archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: Playback will be initiated for any/all available FGOTD Live/VOD archive file(s)

title: FGOTD Ads trigger - Pre-Roll Ads Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: FGOTD Asset must Show Freewheel served pre-roll video ads to user before Playback begins

title: Trigger - Recap Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Recap Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Recap media content
custom_expected: Recap Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Replay playback begins

title: Trigger - Game Highlights Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Highlights Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Game Highlight media content
custom_expected: Game Highlight Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Game Highlight playback begins

title: Non-FGOTD Gameday Sign-in Notification for Free User/Non-Entitlement account
Single Team Account Entitlement is allowed to log into Application
Single Team Account Entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD games for the team associated with said account
custom_expected:
+Watch only your favorite team's video broadast, live and on demand for out of market 2016 Regular Season games.
+ Watch every available broadcast, live and on demand for 2016 Spring Training games.
+ Full HD Video.

Note: this product will not allow you to view live games of any local (in-market) team.

title: Single Team Account Entitlement is not allowed to play Live/VOD games for any team not associated with the account
custom_expected: note: free games should be allowed playback
